name: event-target-to-async-iter

scripts.postinstall: shx ls index.js >> /dev/null 2>&1 || npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:mjs & npm run build:cjs & wait
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && sed -i '' -E 's/\.js/.cjs/g' cjs/*.js && for f in cjs/*.js; do mv "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Florian Klampfer <mail@qwtel.com> (https://qwtel.com/)
description: Takes an event target and an event name and turns it into an async iterable
